headlines.shortHeadline: Bayanai dalla-dalla kan sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni
headlines.headline: e-Naira: Bayanai dalla-dalla kan sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni

promo.summary: A wannan bidiyon Umar Mikail ya mana bayani kan yadda tsarin zai yi aiki.

media.title: Bayanai dalla-dalla kan sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni

synopses.short: e-naira: Bayanai dalla-dalla kan sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni
synopses.long:
Ku latsa hoton da ke sama don kallon bidiyon:

Babban bankin Najeriya ya bayyana hanyoyin da za a yi amfani da sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni 
na eNaira.

A ranar Litinin ne shugaba Muhammadu Buhari na Najeriya ya ƙaddamar da kuɗin.

A wannan bidiyon Umar Mikail ya mana bayani kan yadda tsarin zai yi aiki.
synopses.medium: A wannan bidiyon Umar Mikail ya mana bayani kan yadda tsarin zai yi aiki.

media.caption: e-naira: Bayanai dalla-dalla kan sabon nau'in kudin Najeriya na laturoni

headlines.shortHeadline: Yadda aka kafa Abuja babban birnin tarayyar Najeriya
headlines.headline: Yadda aka kafa Abuja babban birnin tarayyar Najeriya

promo.summary: An samar da birnin Abuja ne domin ya maye gurbin Lagos a matsayin babban birnin Najeriya.

media.title: Yadda aka kafa Abuja babban birnin tarayyar Najeriya

synopses.short: Yadda aka kafa Abuja babban birnin tarayyar Najeriya
synopses.long:
Abuja babban birnin tarayyar Najeriya na daya daga cikin birane wadanda suka fi bunkasa a nahiyar Afirka.

An tsara tare da gina birnin Abuja ne a wani tankamemen yanki da aka debo daga wasu jihohi na tsakiyar kasar. 

Wannan ya sha bam-bam ne da sauran biranen kasar wadanda suka kafu shekaru aru-aru da suka gabata ba.

An samar da birnin Abuja ne domin ya maye gurbin Lagos a matsayin babban birnin Najeriya.
Daga yau Talata BBC Hausa za ta fara gabatar muku jerin bidiyo kan babban birnin na Najeriya Abuja.

Bidiyonmu na yau ya mayarda hankali ne kan yadda aka samo birnin Abuja.
synopses.medium: An samar da birnin Abuja ne domin ya maye gurbin Lagos a matsayin babban birnin Najeriya.

media.caption: Bidiyon yadda aka samo Abuja

headlines.shortHeadline: An gama duk wani yabo da za a yi wa manzon Allah – Bashir Ɗan Musa
headlines.headline: An gama duk wani yabo da za a yi wa manzon Allah – Bashir Ɗan Musa

promo.summary: Fitaccen mawaƙin begen Annabi Muhammad SAW, Malam Bashir Ɗan Musa ya ce yana matukar takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah (SAW) a shekarun nan.

media.title: Ina takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah – Bashir Ɗan Musa

synopses.short: Ina takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah – Bashir Ɗan Musa
synopses.long:
Fitaccen mawaƙin begen Annabi Muhammad SAW, Malam Bashir Ɗan Musa ya ce yana matukar takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah (SAW) a shekarun nan.
Bashir Ɗan Musa ya bayyana haka ne a wata tattaunawa da ya yi da BBC Hausa, inda ya ce rashin ilimi da kuma son rai ne ya kai masu yabo "suka faɗa duhun jahilci" a wannan lokaci.
"A baya mukan rubuta waƙa mu bai wa junanmu kamar ni da Rabi'u Usman Baba da Rufa'i Ayagi da Bashir Tashi da sauransu, idan akwai kuskure mu gyara wa juna.
"Za a duba idan ka bai wa Annabi haƙƙin Allah sai a gyara, in kuma ka bai wa wani waliyyi hakkin da ba nasa ba shi ma a gyra maka," in ji Malam Bashir. 
Ya ce idan kana buƙatar yabon Annabi ba sai ka kushe wanda suke tare da shi ba ko kuma 'yan uwansa annabawa "saboda kowa matsayinsa daban". 
"Idan mutum yana so ya yi bege kamar yadda ya kamata a kan turbar gaskiya to sai ya bi sawun magabata.
"An gama duk wani yabo da za a yi wa ma'aiki, mafi kyau sai mutum ya bi turbar da magata suka bi sai a dace. Amma da ka yi yadda kake so to sai ka zame.
"Da akwai waɗanda suke yin yabo karshe ba sa samun ladan komai, saboda ba sa yin sa kamar yadda ya kamata."
synopses.medium: Fitaccen mawaƙin begen Annabi Muhammad SAW, Malam Bashir Ɗan Musa ya ce yana matukar takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah (SAW) a shekarun nan.

media.caption: Ina takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah – Bashir Ɗan Musa

indexImage.altText: Fitaccen mawaƙin begen Annabi Muhammad SAW, Malam Bashir Ɗan Musa ya ce yana matukar takaicin yadda aka lalata yabon manzon Allah (SAW) a shekarun nan.
